calendar:
  # Template name
  template: monthly.tex

  # While both values are required, only the year of the start date is used.
  start: 2026-01-01
  end: 2026-12-31

variables:
  # All those variables are optionnal.
  # The following values are the default ones.

  # Language (recognized by the LaTeX babel package)
  language: english

  # Paper size (recognized by the LaTeX geometry package)
  papersize: a4paper

  # Title of the calendar. Defaults to the current year
  title: ""

  # Subtitle of the calendar. Empty by default.
  subtitle: ""

  # Files used to illustrate the months
  # Besides `filename`, you can add options `orientation` and `credit`, but those features are experimental: they might be removed any time without warnig, e.g.:
  # - filename: "foo.png"
  # - orientation: "vertical"
  # - credit: "Photo by John Doe, 1990, licence Creative Commons by-sa 4.0."
  pictures:
    - filename: "01"
    - filename: "02"
    - filename: "03"
    - filename: "04"
    - filename: "05"
    - filename: "06"
    - filename: "07"
    - filename: "08"
    - filename: "09"
    - filename: "10"
    - filename: "11"
    - filename: "12"
